author: parithosh
content: We have our own prysm fork that's now a malicious client on devnet-3, so if you notice invalid or mutated columns - its from prysm-geth-1. Local testing showed that it didn't break any client, so we wanted to let it run for longer and with more nodes to try and catch issues.

author: parithosh
content: Which clients support a flag similar to disable-getBlob? cc <@&1367819082019377202>

author: pawandhananjay
content: we don't right now, can add a flag if you need it

author: parithosh
content: yes please! it would help us test the feature even without mev. if lh + prysm has it, then we can test it majority of validators without touching mev
